title: Black Bean Quesadillas
ingredients: 1 can (400g) black beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup shredded cheese (e.g. cheddar or mozzarella)
instructions: In a bowl, mash the black beans with a fork or potato masher.
Add the diced bell pepper, onion, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper to the mashed beans. Mix well to combine.
Spread the bean mixture evenly onto two tortillas.
Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of the bean mixture.
Place the remaining two tortillas on top to create quesadillas.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Place one quesadilla in the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until the tortilla is crispy and the cheese is melted.
Remove from heat and let them cool slightly before cutting into wedges.
Serve with salsa, guacamole, or sour cream if desired.
